# UIBaselineAdjustment.alignBaselines

**Case**

Adjust text relative to the position of its baseline.

## Declaration

```swift
case alignBaselines
```

## Constants

- **UIBaselineAdjustment.alignCenters**: Adjust text relative to the center of its bounding box.
- **UIBaselineAdjustment.none**: Adjust text relative to the top-left corner of the bounding box.
